segments.text: Oh , yes . I often went on business trips in the past six years .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: How many languages can you speak in addition to your mother tongue ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I speak English and French in addition to my mother tongue , Chinese .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: That's fine . What salary do you get at your present position ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: We'll start you off with a base salary of $ 20,000 a year , with bonuses that can add up to $ 40,000 . A company car , and a company pension scheme . Is that acceptable to you ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Excellent . Well , thank you very much , Mr . B , and you'll be hearing from us in the next few days , either way .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Thank you . Mr . A , and I certainly hope the answer will be favorable . Goodbye .
segments.speaker: S2
